overview: The comic mishaps and adventures of a young boy named Ralph, trying to convince his parents, teachers, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift for the 1940s.
tagline: A tribute to the original, traditional, one-hundred-percent, red-blooded, two-fisted, all-American Christmas.
title: A Christmas Story

cast.name: Leigh Brown
cast.character: Red Hatted Curly Haired Woman in Line for Santa (uncredited)

cast.name: Christine Powrie
cast.character: Screaming Girl on Slide After Ralphie (uncredited)
